roleset.name: make stone like through calcification, making stone-like
roleset.note: CALCIFY-V NOTES: Edited by hwangd (from calcify.01-v)
CALCIFIED-J NOTES: Based on Sharp data. Comparison to calcify.01. Calcify.02 is a member of VN class other_cos-45.4. Framed by Katie. (from calcified.01-j)

example.name: Active, Infinitival
example.text: When a fracture takes place, osteoblasts come in * to calcify the tissue surrounding the break.

example.name: Active
example.text: Fluoride apparently calcifies the pineal gland.

example.name: Passive
example.text: ... [the memories]-1 are calcified *-1 through advancing ravages of time ...

example.name: Arg1 only
example.text: This sometimes ends with the calcification of the damaged tissue.

example.name: arg 0 because it causes a chemical change
example.text: The tissue surrounding the break is calcified by osteoblasts.
